name: 95th
description:
First public alpha of a first game.

The soldier behaviours still need tweaking. Particularly target acquisition and reloading, resuscitating downed friendlies, etc.
After soldier behaviour, different soldier weapons will be implemented.

Dropship mechanic needs work.
Persistent Campaign mechanic needs work.
Survive as long as you can scored mode.
Command panel and keyboard input not yet hooked up.
Tutorial and Story needs improving too.
